metadata.title: User Information after Logging In with NextJS
metadata.description: A NextJS application demonstrating how to retrieve and display user profile info, linked addresses, and authentication tokens after successful login with Immutable Passport

metadata.title: Login with Next.js
metadata.description: Example app demonstrating multiple authentication methods using Immutable Passport with Next.js, including wallet login, Ethers.js integration, and identity-only login.

metadata.title: Telegram Mini App with Passport Authentication
metadata.description: An example showing how to integrate Immutable Passport into a Telegram Mini App using device flow authentication and enabling NFT transfers

metadata.title: Connect Wallets with Immutable Passport in Next.js
metadata.description: Demonstrates three different approaches to connecting wallets using Immutable Passport in a Next.js application: EIP-1193, EtherJS, and Wagmi.

metadata.title: Passport Message Signing with Next.js
metadata.description: Example demonstrating how to implement and verify message signing using EIP-712 and ERC-191 standards with Immutable Passport in a Next.js application

metadata.title: Passport Wallet Connection and Transaction Execution with Next.js
metadata.description: Example demonstrating how to connect wallets and execute ERC-721 token transfer transactions using Immutable Passport in a Next.js application
